alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Trego (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 11:20PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Trego and northwestern Ellis Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1120 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Riga, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Riga around 1135 PM CDT. Ellis around 1140 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Yocemento. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for central and west central Kansas.
